Mike Pence says he won't run for presidency U.S. Rep. Mike Pence shut the door Thursday on a run for the presidency but left wide open the likelihood that he'll seek a different office: Governor of Indiana. In the choice between seeking national office and serving Indiana in some capacity, we choose Indiana, Mike Pence , R-Columbus, said of himself and wife Karen in a letter being sent to supporters.`` We will not seek the Republican nomination for president in 2012.''
